name: Oops, Wrong Game!
description:
There's a huge glitch in the new Wintendo Mitch causing the character Marion from Super Marion Brothers to glitch into different games. You need to survive in each game long enough to be glitched into the next and eventually sent back to your own game. Now go, Princess Plum is waiting!

P.S. Similarities to any game company in real life is purely coincidental.

Music from Jim Hall, Komiku, and my brother. Art from pzUH, qubodup, Bart K., Blarumyrran, Zabin, Jetrel,  dogchicken, paradasia, and jlunesc. Thanks to NotEuclidfor helping me with the parallax effect in level 1 and making the background in level 3.
